title: GIS & Spatial Analysis
details: Proficient in geographic information systems, spatial data analysis, and creating maps to visualize geographic patterns and relationships.

title: Data Visualization
details: Creating compelling visual narratives through charts, maps, and interactive dashboards to communicate complex data insights.

title: Python & R
details: Programming and data analysis using Python libraries (pandas, geopandas, matplotlib) and R for statistical computing and graphics.

title: Mapbox & Web Mapping
details: Building interactive web maps using Mapbox GL JS, Leaflet, and other web mapping frameworks for dynamic geographic applications.

title: QGIS
details: Advanced GIS software for spatial data manipulation, geoprocessing, cartography, and creating professional-quality maps.

title: Statistical Analysis
details: Applying statistical methods to analyze data, identify patterns, test hypotheses, and derive meaningful insights from complex datasets.
